Please report any concerns regarding the site by email to ics@environment-agency.gov.uk https://t.co/GF8HqbhiSV
@ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgencyMids Are we in Newcastle and Stoke not entitled to breath clean air? https://t.co/VUX91TV2e9

@EmmaHowardBoyd keele university, UHNS, council leaders, Aspire housing, local schools & colleges, care provisions, businesses & residents are all calling for the landfill to be closed & capped. What else do we need to do to be heard? @EnvAgencyMids @ClareDinnisEA @StinkStopthe

@EnvAgencyMids celebrate after issuing the latest statement concerning Walleys Landfill! Is this the same @EnvAgency team that approved the increase in the permit as the operator was going to breach it anyway?Madness or incompetence? ü§Æü§•ü§îü§¨ #StopTheStink @StinkStopthe #stepup https://t.co/2WPvBGQne5

@EmmaHowardBoyd @AldersgateGrp @COP26 @GFI_green @EnvAgency @WRIClimate @GCAdaptation @ShareAction @BusinessGreen @ftenergy I‚Äôve got a great speech, if my eyes weren‚Äôt streaming and I wasn‚Äôt gagging from the stench from WALLEYS QUARRY I‚Äôd happily read it to you. @RedIndustries2 clean up and get out @StinkStopthe and 6000+ people are  now watching you and we will know about every breach you make..... https://t.co/il8GSxey6T

tweets.text: @EmmaHowardBoyd @EnvAgency @AldersgateGrp @COP26 @GFI_green @WRIClimate @GCAdaptation @ShareAction @BusinessGreen @ftenergy Can you start with basic problems like the odour from Walleys Quarry?You had 1000‚Äôs of complaints at the weekend about it,you could not handle them we are now told the monitoring equipment is faulty...The odour is unreasonable & interferes with day to day life-when will you act?

@LoneRanger77777 @StinkStopthe @EnvAgencyMids @scottdegg @RedIndustries2 @EmmaHowardBoyd  public trust & confidence in the EAs leadership is obliterated  @ClareDinnisEA @JamesBevanEA @EnvAgencyMids @SimonTagg

@EnvAgencyMids @scottdegg @RedIndustries2 You‚Äôre a feeble, spineless organisation that‚Äôs not fit for purpose.  An independent public enquiry into your failings should result in prosecutions for criminal negligence.

@EnvAgencyMids @RedIndustries2 You should be sued for your disgraceful management of the situation. You are supposed to protect the environment and the citizens from polluting companies, not to protect their financial interests. @ClareDinnisEA, do something about this or resign.

@EnvAgencyMids @RedIndustries2 The whole thing needs capping off. Yet again today, I wake up today and smell the horrendous stench in my house. I'm dreading sitting in the garden this summer and we are nearly a mile away. Enough is enough. #capitoff

@EnvAgencyMids @RedIndustries2 The view of the local population is that you're entirely failing in your remit to "work to create better places for people", especially in light of this statement minutes before the extraordinary council meeting.

@EnvAgencyMids @RedIndustries2 This means nothing to the residents of Newcastle under Lyme and stoke on Trent. That landfill isn‚Äôt a landfill  anymore, it‚Äôs a 4/5 storey pile of crap and growing !!! It just needs shutting down and covering up.

@EnvAgencyMids @RedIndustries2 No you don't "work to create better places for people", you do nothing while @RedIndustries2 work to create an awful place for people..
üò†üò†üò†üò† https://t.co/ijvxiD2IlY

@annjsmall @EnvAgencyMids @RedIndustries2 @ClareDinnisEA Everybody should. @ClareDinnisEA and her agency are actively working against thousands of local residents, schools, Keele University, the hospital, businesses, the Borough Council, the County Council etc. Why that agency thinks we should email them, I have no idea. Sod them.

@EnvAgencyMids @RedIndustries2 Rather than email, I suggest people phone the EA until they take some real action. The number is 0800807060. Until @ClareDinnisEA takes this seriously, direct action of this small kind is the only option.
@EnvAgencyMids @RedIndustries2 Pathetic, you WILL be held accountable for your failing!

@EnvAgencyMids @ClareDinnisEA Why are you releasing a a statement while the cross party extraordinary meeting with @SimonTagg and @DaveJonesNuL and the rest of the local councillors is still taking place? Enough is enough! You are the problem, we will sort it out with you! https://t.co/hYcE4vdOEf

@EnvAgencyMids @ClareDinnisEA You have failed us. We will make sure that you are held accountable. Thank you to @AaronBell4NUL for bringing this issue to Number 10. Thank you to @SimonTagg, @DaveJonesNuL and the whole @NewsNBC for pressing this issue.

@StinkStopthe @EnvAgencyMids @ClareDinnisEA @AaronBell4NUL @SimonTagg @DaveJonesNuL @NewsNBC @EmmaHowardBoyd here is the collective voice of our community. 7000+ of them. The leadership team is being called into question. The odour management plan has been significantly breached. Is the EA choosing NOT to regulate? We need answers, we need action.

tweets.text:
As part of our ongoing regulation of the @RedIndustries2 #WalleysQuarry landfill site in #Silverdale #NewcastleUnderLyme we have carried out an audit and issued the company with a Compliance Assessment Report.

Read more üëâ https://t.co/o558iAVicn https://t.co/gyKH2icf6z

This is an important strategy for Cumbria. Our coastal erosion and flooding risk sometimes gets overlooked. This will help secure much needed investment in our coastline and better protect our communities #cumbria #floodriskmanagement  @EnvAgency @CumbriaCC https://t.co/9FDWEtt4Oa

@gillygilly64 @EnvAgencyYNE This debris accumulated primarily in 2019 and then was topped up with subsequent high river levels. Removal won‚Äôt increase any flood risk downstream but will decrease blockage risk.

Each flood incident is different and it depends how fast the rain falls and in which area.
@EnvAgencyMids @RedIndustries2 @ClareDinnisEA Incompetent cowards.

@EnvAgencyMids @RedIndustries2 So your basically ignoring each and everyone of us that this affects us on a daily basis! We are being poisoned is it actually going take deaths for u sit up and take notice!

@EnvAgencyMids You gave @RedIndustries2 a temp permit in 2019 to take extra waste, so that they didn't breach their previous permit. Why? Was it more important to you that they didn't breach than it was for you to do your job? Something doesn't smell right.
